roleset.name: make an educated guess

example.name: hypothesize-v: passive
example.text: It might be alleged that TV has done more than its share to popularize and promote non - violent civil disobedience , so the second situation hypothesized above would be simply a case of `` chickens coming home to roost . ''

example.name: hypothesize-v: ARG1
example.text: It might be alleged that TV has done more than its share to popularize and promote non - violent civil disobedience , so the second situation hypothesized above would be simply a case of `` chickens coming home to roost . ''

roleset.note: HYPOTHESIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hypothesize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from hypothesize.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: theoretical, suppositional

example.name: hypothetical-j: arg1
example.text: A couple weeks before or after thanksgiving , but most likely second week of december . Nothing in stone ... and just hypothetical at present time

roleset.note: HYPOTHETICAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. Closely related to 'hypothesize.01'. (from hypothetical.01-j)
